metadata.title: CVE-2021-23958 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The browser could have been confused into transferring a screen sharingstate into another tab, which would leak unintended information. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 85.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-23958` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 85.0+build1-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-geckodriver - 85.0+build1-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 85.0+build1-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '85.0+build1-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
